name: abid2

body.origin:
|- wceq(cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c0)
-| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c0)
-| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: A simplification of class abstraction. Commuted form of ~ abid1 . See comments there. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-1993.)
